title: Rando[m] ConverZations: Shari and Luke on the Wholeness of God
description:
Shari and Luke discuss duality, continual communion with God, universalism, love, overcoming anxiety, and more.

1:10 Intuition as Feminine
1:40 Shari’s experience of God & the world as harmonious, nondichotomous, nondual, God-everywhere
2:30 Impulse to Categorization
2:45 Justice Sermon, George MacDonald, God as Magistrate and Father but God is One.
3:05 (&7:06) Integration of Dualisms
4:30 Yin Yang
5:20 Analytical Mind and the Unitive Mind
6:05 Masculine and Feminine Dualism (Male and Female)
8:15 Mind Body Dualism, What is Materiality?, What is wrong with the Western Mind?
9:10 Body Belief, Michael Polanyi
10:55 What leads to Identitarianism?
11:05 Reintegrating the Mind and Body of the West, Liturgy
11:27 “It’s like riding a bike.”
11:57 Ego and the Egoic Intellect
13:00 Diving Feminine, Rainer Maria Rilke, “The deepest experience of the creator is feminine, for it is experience of receiving and bearing.” https://excellencereporter.com/2019/06/17/rainer-maria-rilke-on-the-wisdom-and-the-purpose-of-life/
13:35 Symbolically the conscious mind as masculine, Body as feminine, Judgement, Meditation, Wisdom vs Knowledge, Value, the Malevolent Feminine
16:35 “I’ve been learning that a lot of the ideas that I’ve had have names.”, Intellectualism and Scholasticism vs Intelligence and Wisdom
18:40 Is it unfair to expect someone to be more integrated?
19:40 Rationalism eats itself. Overwhelmed with ideas
20:25 Wheat and the chaff, Sheep and Goats, the Elect and the Reprobate
21:00 Not being able to articulate what’s inside one’s own mind
22:00 Matt Allison Jesus’s parable about the persistent friend knocking at night, the tenacity of goats
23:20 Matthew 11:12 “From the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffers violence, and violent men take it by force.”
https://biblehub.com/lexicon/matthew/11-12.htm
23:39 “So because you are lukewarm, and neither hot nor cold, I will spit you out of My mouth.”
28:45 Video reference: Oct. 10, 2019 - Chris Heuertz - Faith & Contemplation: How Prayer Changes the World - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aKkyZ_D1dyY

Rainer Maria Rilke quote and article 

https://excellencereporter.com/2019/06/17/rainer-maria-rilke-on-the-wisdom-and-the-purpose-of-life/
